text: Fhum Isreriŋ ndigi tɨv, mba tɨv khaŋ nzuai, “Mbe Rivaiiŋ, mbera Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgi kɨrga.” Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe Rivaiiŋ, mbe Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgi kav, mbe mba gumgi gu mbigir muuŋgirim, mbe nzerarga, Fhe Bakɨme thaŋ suaŋv, harigi guma the suaŋrim, ana zumgum zɨv, Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guma kɨv, Merkisedek farar muuŋgip kɨv, ana Aron farar muuŋgip kɨrga fhu.
